a1: Yes, they've got a good record and a great reputation in Europe.
q2: How long has Juventus had a good record?
a2: Well they've won the champions league back in 1996 so I guess since then.
q3: What do you think about the Duo of Ronaldo and Dybala in Juventus?
a3: I think they will perform well
q4: I agree with that, they will be an excellent duo
a4: I think they will be very strong together.
q5: Now Ronaldo is there will they win the champions league
